event.title: Keynote "Free Software, local economy and its political realization" at CUSL in Zaragoza, Spain

body.p: The "Concurso Universitario de Software Libre" (CUSL) is a contest among students from different Universities in Spain. On May 7 and 8 there will be an awarding ceremony in the University of Zaragoza. Erik Albers gives a keynote about "Free Software, local economy and its political realization".
